很好的一款老时代的设计游戏，Valve在2003年发行这个游戏，经典而且很良心，完全中文配音，完全简体中文，任务很有趣，而且打击感很高（在那个时代），原版CS是无法加入Bot的，而这一代是有任务的，但是没有剧情，只是纯粹的任务，分为4个难度，就是机器人实在是很怂，比较弱鸡，可以完全略杀机器人，有多人模式，可以线上玩，画质和CS差不多，零点行动个人任务就是Valve加上了文字剧情描述和Bot的CS，但是很好玩，玩起来根本停不下来，很推荐入手毕竟现在玩正版CS的不多，在线上找到的服务器很少，还是CS:CZ比较好玩，很推荐
其它的就是关卡模式，这个好像是买零点行动送的吧，是CS：CZDS，游戏很不错，很有意思，敌人设置的站位很合理，而且游戏的打击感还不错，就是有几个不好的地方，首先敌人好笑是铁做的一半，不打头半个弹夹才死一个，而且子弹补给少的可怜，如果不节约子弹，估计经常连手枪子弹都缺，但是任务很有意思，潜入，强攻，每个模式都很好，早期的经典很不错
总结一下，很不错的2款游戏，之前还不知道这个CS：CZDS是什么，下了玩了之后才知道原来还有关卡模式，很有Valve的风范，大大的推荐入手

Spoodermun says:

-Review for Condition Zero

It's ok.

-Review for Deleted Scenes

This is stupidly frustrating. Easy is.. well... easy. Insultingly easy, that is. Medium and Hard? Almost impossible. Enemies fire the moment the see a single pixel of you, and rules constantly change about what surfaces you can and cannot shoot through. Ammo is rediculously scarce, with enemies not dropping a single bullet for you to pick up. 
Don't get me started on the fucking enemy weapons. They range from pistolarios, shotgun fuckers, assault rifles, MP9 users, and snipers. On medium and hard difficulty, they all do rediculous amounts of damage. Especially shotguns. Man, do I hate shotguns. The point of a shotgun is to do heavy damage at close range, right? In this game, enemy shotguns shave of 30 HP on Hard or Medium when in close range, and they take off 10-25 HP AT ANY DISTANCE ON HARD OR MEDIUM! I frequently found myself dying due to these fucking shotgun assholes; if not losing tons of health within seconds. It would be manageable if they had the pmup action, but no! They are equipped with the AUTOMATIC SHOTGUN! Your best hope is to stun them or get an instant kill... But wait! This game feels the need to treat NPC's like players and give them lots of fucking health! Enemies rarely flinch, and even more rarely die with headshots. The only 3 weapons that gaurantee an instakill with a headshot are the magnum sniper rifle, deagle, and LAW bazooka.

This game can also be stupidly buggy. Aside from enemies shooting me through walls and materials I can confirm could not be shot through by the player, I experienced a bug that made me quit playing Deleted Scenes(Minor spoiler warning!). During a chase sequence in which you have to capture the bad guy who has a nuke (how predictable), there are segments in which he will stop to order his man to come and assist him. Now during this part, the head honcho cannot be damaged. However, he and his fucking M60 can damage the player and slice off a nice chunk of health. In a hallway, I got sick of him and his goonies' shit, so I threw a grenade that killed all his men but him. Apparently this angered him to the point where he stormed down the stairs and stood defiently in front of me, as if he was about to give me a piece of his mind. Fate smiled upon me it seemed, as it allowed the flinching to work with every bullet I unloaded into his stupid flapping mouth that screamed russian profanities at me. After having exhausted the magazines in all 6 guns (You know how long CS weapons take to reload) that I had, the AI essentially said "Nice job. My turn, faggot" and fired A SINGLE BURST INTO MY FACE... I then quit the game, and have uninstalled it.

Unless you're sadistic, a fan of hardcore twitch shooters, or one of those CS gods, stay away from this.

If you are looking for a hard freaking core trainer to getting better at other counter strikes, here is where you should start. You will start out with bots that are super easy, but as you progress and get to the levels on hard difficulty they will be so freaking hard. I have only pumped about a dozen hours into this and it has DEFINANTLY helped me with my accuracy and problem solving skills on global offensive. This counter strike is considered to be the worse, but I can tell you it is FAR from that. I would reccomend getting this game for training to be better on other CS games, or to just have and extremelly fun and VERY challenging single player experience. This game is a must buy for PC gamers. Make sure to tweek the setting so even people with the crappiest PC's can play it at a rock solid 60 frames per second. Trust me, worth the buy.

Ок,как я понял,игра делится на 2 компании,игра с ботами с заданиями,и типа сюжет.Поиграл я с ботами,и как то не пошло,бот просто исчез,а управление и стрельба в 1.6 мне не привычна,так что я так и не прошёл дальше 1-ой миссии.Запустил я Deleted Scenes,и это меня затянуло.И я скорее напишу обзор на неё,так как она интереснее и...хардовее,ну точнее хардовей на последних миссиях...Короче игра типа если бы в кс был сюжет,а точнее линейность,мы играем за как всегда супер спецназовца,который всех режит на право и на лево,но впрочем о "линейности".Короче я так и не понял,играем мы за одного и того же чувака или за разных,но факт в том,что мы бываем на разных частях планеты,и участвуем в заданиях типа обезвредить бомбу(достаточно редко),вытащить заложниокв(тоже) или...просто пойти уровень,то есть походить,всех расстрелять,И ВСЁ(на последних миссиях это не так легко).Ну и впрочем всё,ну это интересно,сюжет содержит 12 операций,и 7 дополнительно(в World Map),ну а так же есть миссия на карабле,на котором будет бой с истребителем на АВП,я не мог этого не написать,ведь это про сто БЕЗУМИЕ!!!!!!!!!

Obtive o game no pacote completo da Valve, e o que tenho a dizer, é que é um bom passatempo caso fique sem net, ou arrume amigos pra jogar online. Não recomendaria a compra avulsa a não ser que deseje completar uma coleção de Counter-Strike. Mas vamos ao jogo.
O mesmo é praticamente a mesma coisa do 1.6, não tem diferença na jogabilidade, somente nos gráficos, que parece a versão Source do Half-Life 1. Está visualmente muito bom mesmo, nem reconheci quando abri o game. 
Porém, o diferencial dele é as missões que você tem que fazer para poder passar pra missão seguinte. O negócio é da seguinte forma: Você cria seu perfil (arquivo de save), escolhe a dificuldade desejada, e em seguida o mapa desbloqueado. Após isso, seleciona o seu time (bots), num critério de pontos (o jogo te disponibiliza 1 ponto a mais por cada missão, no caso, mapa, concluída) e você pode gastar esses pontos para escolher a sua equipe usando critérios como Skill (habilidade), Bravery (bravura) e Coop (cooperatividade). 
Dito isso, vamos as tais missões. Como você deve saber nas experiências do CS, existem mapas próprios para resgate de reféns, plantar bomba, etc. Pois bem, esses mapas estarão todos aqui, e suas missões principais serão essas. Resgatar os reféns e impedir a bandidagem (TRs) de plantar a bomba. Até então, não descobri como jogar de TR, então vc só pode jogar de CT.
Falei anteriormente de missões principais, agora iremos para as secundárias. Todo mapa te dá alguns desafios que você tem que cumprir além das missões principais para poder passar para o mapa seguinte. Em suma, essas missões são quase a mesma coisa, matar ''x'' inimigos, matar ''x'' inimigos com arma ''x'' (essas duas anteriores tem em todo mapa), resgatar ''x'' reféns, vencer o round em menos de 75 segundos, etc. Embora seja coisa simples, mesmo que você cumpra o objetivo principal dado pelo mapa, você tem que vencer 3 rounds no mínimo. Porém, você só passa para o próximo mapa se completar os objetivos secundários, independente do número de rounds que ganhar. Resumindo, foque nos challenges. =)

Não tenho paciencia pra ficar avaliando cada elemento do jogo em separado, até porque pra CS isso é meio injusto, mas daria nota 9 ao jogo. Apesar de não ser tão badalado como o 1.6, as missões são legais.
